price: 34 Pharaon dit alors aux grands d’Egypte qui l’entouraient : « Voilà un habile magicien
arabic: قَالَ لِلۡمَلَإِ حَوۡلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qāla lil'mala-i ḥawlahu inna hādhā lasāḥirun ʿalīmun
